tool_description: Retrieve Google Calendar Events from a public calendar
name: CalendarEvents

api_list.name: Calendar Events
api_list.description: Retrieve Google Calendar Events from a public calendar

required_parameters.name: src
required_parameters.description:
Calendar ID (ending in `@group.calendar.google.com`).
You can find it in the `src` parameter of the embed URL

optional_parameters.name: months
optional_parameters.description:
Number of months of events to retireve.
Default is `2`. Max is `12`.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://calendarevents.p.rapidapi.com/calendar/a212edcb509733e73dca4ef55f447980c6b2b5db055aaa46bf3fda05f3c6e452@group.calendar.google.com/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "calendarevents.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://calendarevents.p.rapidapi.com/calendar/{src}/{months}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "calendarevents.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
